scripts.dev:no-cloudflare: cd apps/web && SKIP_CLOUDFLARE=true bun run dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules .turbo && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.test:e2e: bash scripts/free-port.sh 2>/dev/null || true && bunx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: bash scripts/free-port.sh 2>/dev/null || true && bunx playwright test --ui
